responsibilities: Performed repairs and component level analysis of cutting edge broadcasting equipment.

Performed failure analysis and root cause investigations on defects, primarily focusing on Linux based modules, to identify and implement effective corrective actions.

experience.skills: C++, Python, OpenCV, Computer Vision, IP Camera
responsibilities: Developed a backend system using Python, C++, and OpenCV for comprehensive camera control, image processing, and video recording.
Researched techniques to process the videos, using computer vision algorithms to extract and analyze insights from visual data.
Collaborated within a cross-functional team using agile methodology, ensuring continuous delivery and iterative improvement throughout the development lifecycle.

experience.skills: Teaching, CAD, Solidworks, Electronics, Image Processing, Matlab, Embedded Systems, 3D printing

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website

projects.title: Movie Catalog API
projects.description: A RESTful API for managing movies, directors, and genres. Movies can be associated with multiple genres and directors and can be filtered by these relationships.

projects.title: Iris Biometrics Recognition
projects.description: This research created a new iris image dataset using white light to improve recognition for Latin-American eyes. By adapting the EigenIris method and analyzing RGB channels, especially blue, the study achieved strong accuracy without infrared.
projects.tech: Python, OpenCV, Biometrics Recognition, Image Processing

projects.title: ESP32 Temperature Logger
projects.description: Reads temperature and humidity using DHT11, displays data on OLED, and publishes via MQTT.
projects.tech: ESP32, DHT11, MQTT, OLED, Arduino, I2C

projects.title: Word Search Solver
projects.description: This Python project solves word search puzzles by finding the sequence of letters that form a target word in the correct direction from a grid
projects.tech: Python, AWS, Lambda, API Gateway, Apmlify, Data Structures

projects.title: Video Cropper
projects.description: This script lets users select and crop a video region using mouse clicks, then saves the cropped output.
